GroupBy(String)

Add GROUP BY criteria. the final Sql string will be composed by appending all critera together seperated by commas. Include parenthisis and boolean operators as needed in the criteria parameter.

SuffixSql(String)

Adds provided sql to the end of the sql statement. Suffix sql should be already be properly escaped. Sql text provided will overwrite any previous set value.

Declaration
public virtual SqlQuery SuffixSql(string sql)
